group_1.narration: And that was the start of@Emily's Counseling Room...!
Asuka and Sasara did a great job @advertising... It got super busy!

group_1.textRight: Ummm...@Well, there's this person I like and...

group_1.textLeft: You just, like, go for it or something.@Hmmm...

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah,[chara:303101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_200] I guess you're right!@Just go for it!

group_1.narration: I felt so much better after@I talked to Emiri...!
Success bred success, and the counseling@room got more and more popular!
Okay, let's hear what one of their@customers had to say...

group_1.textCenter: It was fantastic!@[chara:100301:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]All my troubles are gone now!
I mean, it took a lot of work on my part@too, but...
But still... She's the best!@I'm so grateful for her help!

group_1.narration: On one of their busy days,@this one girl showed up.

group_1.textCenter: ...So this is it, huh.@this one girl visited the room...

group_1.narration: [textRed:Ria Ami]... She's the @most beautiful girl in Kamihama!
But she got her beauty@from a Magical Girl contract.
She appears full of confidence, @but inside, she is full of self-doubt...
So she decided to seek the help of Emiri@who had become famous for giving frank@and honest advice...

group_1.textRight: (...The crowd is finally thinning out...)@and honest advice...
(Guess it's now or never!)

group_1.textLeft: Oh, excuse me, but could you wait just @a moment?

group_1.textRight: ...What is it?@a moment?

group_1.textLeft: Did you come here for counseling?

group_1.textRight: Counseling? Me?
(If people find out I came for counseling,@I'll never be able to show my face again!)
I only came because I was curious to see@what you're doing here.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, is that right? Well then...
This is a counseling room. The owners@of the mall are letting us use this space.

group_1.textRight: Oh, a counseling room.@That's interesting…

group_1.textLeft: But anyway, we're done for the day.

group_1.textRight: Done...?
(Damn! I wasted too much time watching!@But...there must be something I can do!)
Who's running this establishment?
A girl?@That's unusual.[chara:301001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]

group_1.textLeft: We call her "Emily" here.@Well...isn't that unique.

group_1.textRight: Hmm...she must be an interesting person.@[chara:301001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]Might I have a chance to meet her?
(Okay! I think I played that perfectly!)

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry. I'm afraid@she's already really tired...

group_1.textRight: But I'm… I'm [chara:301001:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Ria Ami!@And[chara:301001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json] I would like to meet her...

group_1.textLeft: Ria...Ami?@Hmm, I've heard that name somewhere...

group_1.textRight: So then, if you don't mind.
Come on!@I told you... I'm Ria Ami!

group_1.textLeft: I said we're done for the day!@If you could come back another time...

group_1.textRight: But I'm Ria Ami!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Akira-chi! Let's get some@sweet bean jelly on the way—
Huh? Who is she? Huh? Huh?@sweet mitsumame on the way—

group_1.textRight: Huh? Me? @Well I'm—

group_1.textLeft: Oh my god! Like, oh em gee!@How is this even?!

group_1.textRight: I'm...@...Errr, ummm... What?
